Megaton watches from above as Starscream batters Nighteyes, "I remember you=
."He thinks, watching the two bots battle. The great dragon tucks his wings=
 into his side and swoops toward Starscream, launching three ice blasts at =
the bot. Megaton didn't know fully who his allies were but he recognized St=
arscream as an enemy, that was good enough for him.
  ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
  From: JP3884@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday=
, January 04, 2001 10:06 AM
  Subject: Re: Stage one (finished)


       Sc=
reaming at the firepower of Starscream, Nighteyes sprints as fast as 
  her=
 bleeding legs carry her. By far, she is the most damaged Predacon in this =

  whole mess. 
        Looking back at her attacker, she jumps and manuver=
s herself up into a 
  large tree. There, she waits only a moment before le=
aping from the green 
  brush of leaves and asending on Starscream with two=
 pistols raining down 
  blasts on him. As the shots fall, so do the drops =
of mech off of her body. 

        Megatron watches as Killfest come back w=
ith four more explosion 
  blasts. He braced himself, and was sent rolling =
violently. He got up 50 yards 
  further from him. With one eye gone, and n=
ow a middle finger snapped off 
  somewhere, and a portion of his hip to ac=
company it, he was leaking mech. 
        He held out his Tailgun, and fire=
d 15 shots after Killfest. Some aimed 
  for him legs, others at his chest,=
 and three for his face. Megatron was going 
  to damage this bot, there wa=
s no escaping it. He wanted to put Killfest 
  through misery. 

        Ta=
nkkor began to rip the tenticles off of his large Vhicon body, but 
  they =
began to overwheal the titan. He yelled, thrashed, and sent off shots 
  in=
to mid air. Turning, he aimed for a tree and fired. 
        The tree burst=
 into a spectacular fire freenzy and soon, the 
  neighboring trees around =
it became engulfed. The battle scene soon became an 
  inferno, complete wi=
th falling brush, smoke, ash, and an incredible heat. 

        Marine winc=
ed as a branch covered in flames fell near him. He looked 
  at Endbringer,=
 and bent down on one knee, coughing from the smoke. He aimed 
  his missle=
 launcher for Endbringers back, where he assumed the tenticles 
  sprouted =
from. He fired five deafining bursts. 

        Tarantulas slowly backed aw=
ay, his face cover, "Oh no..." He rasped 
  silently, waiting to get hit by=
 Greven. He held out his gun in front of his 
  and fired a round of 25 bla=
sts at him. 

        Aerostreak dives to Grevens back, two of his claws ex=
tended and aimed 
  to dig into the bots backside. 

        Akron sees Sca=
ther disappear, but she continues forward. The shound of 
  the struggling =
kept her on his trail. She sent out 4 energon blasts in a 
  line, one of t=
hem bound to hit him. 

        Putnam was sent slamming itno a tree, one e=
ngulfed in fire. He jetted 
  back into the sky, now with a light singe cov=
ering his silver armor. He 
  watched as Akron fired on Scyther and Darkmou=
se, with a slight clue to what 
  direction they were in. He joined her. 

=
        Odiphious and Venus rise to join Putnam and Akron. Now with Darkmou=
se 
  invisable, it would be difficult to hit her from the ground. Venus, w=
ith her 
  lasso, tossed it out in the direction of the shots. 



        =
eGroups Sponsor
